wordGroup: arsenic trioxide 三氧化二砷；[化]砒霜

sentences.en: Analysis showed that traces of arsenic were present in the body.
sentences.cn: 分析显示，尸体中有微量砒霜。

sentences.en: Indium, for example, had previously been assigned an atomic mass between those of arsenic and selenium.
sentences.cn: 例如，人们以前认为铟的原子质量介于砷和硒之间。

sentences.en: The scientists have also confirmed the impact of water with high arsenic content on beet, carrot and wheat crops.
sentences.cn: 科学家们还证实了高砷水对甜菜、胡萝卜和小麦的影响。
